metadata.title_english: Treasury of the Supreme Vehicle: Autocommentary
metadata.author: Longchen Rabjampa (1308-1364)
metadata.audit_status: VERIFIED - All 88 sections confirmed against Tibetan source (2026-02-09)
metadata.correction_note: CRITICAL CORRECTION (2026-02-09): Chapter 14 moved to Volume 1 (pages 413-479) with 4 subsections added. Volume 2 chapters confirmed as 15-19. ADDITIONAL CORRECTION: Chapter 9 identified and added at page 300 (lines 12475-12499), containing symbolic explanations of delusion through spontaneous presence mode. Total chapters: 19. Total sections: 88. All boundaries verified by reading actual Tibetan source text from volume_1/tibetan/ and volume_2/tibetan/
